title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Coconino National Forest, Arizona
content:
Photo submitted by Josiah Hartzell, “Getting a big ride in on a section of the Arizona Trail before the Coconino National Forest got closed for the extreme fire danger. Gorgeous section of trail through Schultz Pass, just outside Flagstaff, AZ.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Coconino National Forest, Arizona appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
